messages.speaker: User
messages.content: This is PERSON_LASTNAME_1 from SMU Libraries. How may I help you?

messages.speaker: User
messages.content: I am working with my feature piece, which topic is about dream interpretation. I plan to interview someone to share their opinions, and then I think it might be a fair idea to interview psychology profs in SMU (once I see the emailers to conduct psychology surveys etc.) I want to know if it is appropriate to contact the prof for that? just send invitation emails to have a try......

messages.speaker: Help Desk
messages.content: I see. I'd suggest you to get in touch with SMU's Institutional Review Board on your intended interviews.

messages.speaker: Help Desk
messages.content: It doesn't matter if your intended interviewees are from SMU or external, I think you prorbably have to submit an IRB application.

messages.speaker: Help Desk
messages.content: You may drop them an email to irb@smu.edu.sg to check before you go ahead with the IRB application.
